item.trans: n. 乙烯 同义词:ethene, dimethylene Such reactions to ethylene are consistent with ancient reports .这些乙烯导致的反应和古人的报告一致。
n. 基础；柱石；地基 同义词:elements, basis, bed, radical, sole Yet in Tokyo she hailed the security alliance with Japan as a cornerstone of American foreign policy .希拉里在东京将美日安全合作关系誉为美国外交政策的基石。
n. 分数；部分；小部分；稍微 同义词:score, marks, proportion, part, portion But it receives only fraction of the research budget devoted to AIDS .但对肺结核病的研究经费投入只占艾滋病的一小部分。
n. 弯曲，变形；音调变化 同义词:deformation, transformation, distortion, curve, give To give a particular tone or inflection to.'定'。''''。'调'。''给予一个确定的音调或声调。
n. 器具；器械；装置 同义词:device, apparatus, installation, unit, tool a fully applianced bedroom设备齐全的卧室
n. 服装；衣服 vt. 给…穿衣 同义词:clothes, garment, array, wear, thread, dress, clothe He is gorgeously appareled.他穿着华丽。
adj. 巴洛克式的；结构复杂的，形式怪样的 n. 巴洛克风格；巴洛克艺术 Festivals , attended by aristocrats and the public, were a feature of the baroque courts .节假日期间，贵族和平民同时到访已经成为巴洛克展厅的一大特点。
n. [数] 分母；命名者 同义词:namer, nomenclator A denominator of many low- stress jobs is tangible results .许多低压力的工作都有个共同点那就是其效果切实可见。
adj. 遗传的；世袭的；世代相传的 n. 遗传类 同义词:genetic, inherited The Home of Lords consists of hereditary peers , life peers , high churchmen and some judges .上议院由世袭的贵族、终身贵族、高级圣职人员和一些法官组成。
n. [数] 商；系数；份额 同义词:parameter, coefficient, lot, Shang, modulus That may be another way to speak of " EQ , " or " emotional quotient .换句话说就是“情商”或“情绪商数”。

n. [数] 十角形；[数] 十边形 Take 10 golden triangles , arrange them with their sharp points touching , and you have a golden decagon , fitting perfectly within the iris of the eye, vertices neatly touching the rim .画10个金三角，把它们的顶点挨着排好，然后你就得出一个金十边形，与瞳孔中的虹膜完美地一致，十边形的最早点正好在眼眶。
vi. 欺骗；开玩笑；戏弄 n. 傻瓜；愚人；受骗者 vt. 欺骗，愚弄 adj. 傻的 同义词:pull a fast one, give the shaft, stupid, donkey, sell, fox, kid, twp, softheaded Can't you stop fooling ?你不能不干蠢事?
adj. 匀称的，对称的 同义词:well-proportioned, meristic This problem can be avoided by using three components which produce a symmetrical path curve .使用三块能产生反对称形路径曲线的元件，即可避免上述问题。
n. 金字塔；角锥体 vi. 渐增；上涨；成金字塔状 vt. 使…渐增；使…上涨；使…成金字塔状 同义词:advance, to go up demand continues to pyramid需求量继续增加
n. 坟墓边 At the graveside , his widow and daughters clung to his corpse .在墓旁，他的遗孀和女儿们依偎在他的遗体边。
vt. 使转变；转换…；使…改变信仰 vi. 转变，变换；皈依；改变信仰 n. 皈依者；改变宗教信仰者 同义词:transform, shift, idolater, proselytizer Water is converted into steam if it is boiled.水沸腾时转化为蒸汽。
n. [生化] 植物生长素；植物激素 同义词:phytohormone, growth hormone Apical buds produce a growth hormone called auxin .顶芽分泌出叫做生长素的生长类激素。
n. 散文；单调 adj. 散文的；平凡的；乏味的 vi. 写散文；乏味地讲话 vt. 把…写成散文 同义词:essay, monotony, ordinary, stock, stupid prosing or versing写散文或作诗
adj. 最远的；最外面的；最高头的 同义词:farthermost, farmost Teams must have outmost body covering of same colour and prominent player number .各队出赛时必须穿上同色球衣，并须有可清晰辨认之号码。
adj. 有趣的；迷人的 v. 引起…的兴趣；策划阴谋；私通（intrigue的ing形式） 同义词:colorful, funny, killing, taking, brewing to intrigue against one's friends阴谋陷害朋友
adj. 忧郁的；使人悲伤的 n. 忧郁；悲哀；愁思 同义词:blue, dark, sadness, doldrums This is a melancholy scene .这是一个令人悲伤的情景。
adj. 生态的，生态学的 The ecological damage , and the cries for compensation from sick civilians and soldiers , continue to this day .生态的受损，因之患病的平民和士兵的赔偿请求一直延续至今。
n. 主题；科目；[语] 主语；国民 adj. 服从的；易患…的；受制于…的 vt. 使…隶属；使屈从于… 同义词:topic, theme, nation, titles, motive, followed, compliant It is a bounden duty for a soldier to be subjected to the orders.服从命令是军人的天职。
vi. 分散，散开；散射 vt. 使散射；使散开，使分散；使散播，使撒播 n. 分散；散播，撒播 同义词:spread around, spread about, disject, disperse, dissemination, decentralization to scatter seeds播种
n. 参数；系数；参量 同义词:coefficient, arguments, modulus At least one parameter contained a type that was not supported .至少有一个参数含有不支持的类型。
adj. 原核的 同义词:procaryotic, pronuclear Conclusion : prokaryotic expression vector with target gene was constructed successfully .结论：成功构建了带有目的基因的原核表达载体。
n. 泥瓦匠；共济会会员（等于freemason） vt. 用砖瓦砌成 同义词:Templar, Freemasonry Suddenly , Mason and a group of agents surround them .忽然，梅森和一队探员包围了他们。
n. 轿车；轿子 同义词:saloon car, passenger car Because comprehending speech requires attention , as sedan .因为理解语言像开车一样需要注意集中力。
adj. 沉闷的；冗长乏味的 同义词:dreary, dreich It would , however, be very tedious and difficult to write all information in binary code .把所有的信息都翻译成二进制码是十分枯燥和困难的。
n. 捐赠者；供者；赠送人 adj. 捐献的；经人工授精出生的 同义词:donator Objective To summarize the nursing experience in donor kidney transplantation .目的总结亲属活体肾移植的手术配合要点。
vt. 评定；估价；对…征税 同义词:evaluate, rate, value, prize The lawyers assessed the property at $35,000。律师们估计这笔财产价值35 000美元。
n. 工匠，技工 同义词:workman, craftsman Every man is the artisan of his own fortune .每个人都是制造其自身命运的工匠。
n. 红纹蚯蚓；幼鲑 同义词:parr, grilse
adj. 认知的，认识的 同义词:recognitive, epistemic This cognitive deficits are generally considered part of the definition of ADHD .这些认知上的缺陷通常被认为是ADHD定义的一部分。
n. 齿龈炎 Improves gum health - Clinically proven to reverse gingivitis and help shrink periodontal pockets .改善牙龈健康-临床实验证明，扭转牙龈炎帮助缩小牙周袋。
vt. 切除；收税 n. 消费税；货物税 同义词:resect, abscise, consumption tax, goods tax to excise a part of a book删去书的一部分
n. 拆除（等于demolishment）；破坏；毁坏 同义词:destruction, breaking, blasting Croft and a sergeant from the pioneer and demolition platoon stepped up .克洛夫特和工兵爆破排的一个士官走了出来。
n. 疫苗；牛痘苗 adj. 疫苗的；牛痘的 同义词:bacterin The decision to make pandemic vaccine is a gamble .制造大流行流感疫苗的决定是一次赌博。
n. 暗杀，行刺 同义词:thuggism Then , it was a Palestinian assassination attempt on an Israeli diplomat in London .当时是一名巴勒斯坦人企图暗杀以色列驻伦敦的一位外交官。
vt. 零售；转述 vi. 零售 n. 零售 adv. 以零售方式 adj. 零售的 同义词:sell-through, resale This kind of chocolate is retailed at one pound a kilo.这种巧克力糖零售每公斤一英镑。
vi. 衰退，[核] 衰减；腐烂，腐朽 n. 衰退，[核] 衰减；腐烂，腐朽 vt. 使腐烂，使腐败；使衰退，使衰落 同义词:fail, flag, recession, downturn, decline, decomposition, corrupt, septicize vegetation that was decaying腐烂中的草本
n. 企业；事业；进取心；事业心 同义词:career, cause, undertaking, project, push The new labor unions spelled the end of free enterprise .新的工会的成立意味着自由企业的终结。
n. 入店行窃 v. 装作顾客在商店偷窃（shoplift的ing形式） The millionaire who was caught shoplifting was found to be suffering from kleptomania .那个因逛街时顺手牵羊而被捉到的百万富翁，被发现有盗窃癖。
n. 吹牛，炫耀；喇叭或号角嘹亮的吹奏声 vt. 热热闹闹地宣布 同义词:display, blague For a world first, the announcement came with fanfare .作为一项世界先例，消息发布之低调令人吃惊。
vi. 支吾；蹒跚地走 vt. 支吾地说；结巴地讲出 n. 踌躇；支吾；颤抖 同义词:mouch, hesitancy, vacillation The boy faltered when the policeman demanded his name.在警察要求男孩说出他的姓名时，他支支吾吾。
adj. 永恒的；不朽的 同义词:permanent, lasting, everlasting, undying, timeless Do you think that you can find eternal love through the Internet ?你认为你可以通过互联网到永久的爱情吗？
adj. 平凡的，乏味的；散文体的 同义词:ordinary, stock, stupid At this grand moment Pug Henry 's thoughts were prosaic .在这个伟大的时刻，帕格?亨利的思想却毫无诗意。
adj. 人种志的；民族志学的 Ethnographic study in Russia , foreign goods blocked at the gate .学习俄国民族志，洋货挡在大门口。
adj. [动] 脊索动物的；具有脊索的 n. 脊索动物 chordate marine animal of the subphylum Urochordata; a tunicate.包含真正的脊椎动物和脊索动物。
adj. 详尽的；彻底的；消耗的 同义词:thorough, complete, detailed, full, radical It is not , of course , exhaustive .当然这是不够详尽的。
n. [物] 质子 同义词:merron, uron For example , in nuclear physics one takes the mass , charge and spin of the proton as inputs .举个例子，在原子核物理中，质子的质量、电荷、自旋就得当成预设的参数。
n. 帆布 vt. 用帆布覆盖，用帆布装备 adj. 帆布制的 同义词:sailcloth The vase became his canvas .花瓶就是他的画布。
n. 比率，比例 同义词:rate, scale The census of 2000 and the CASS study both showed the ratio stable at around 120 .2000年的人口普查和中国社会科学院的研究都表明，性别比稳定在120左右。
vi. 审计；[审计] 查帐 n. 审计；[审计] 查帐 vt. （美）旁听 同义词:examine and verify, sit in on The accountants audited the company’s books at the end of the fiscal year.财政年度结束时，会计师们审查公司的账册。

adj. 休耕的；不活跃的 n. 休耕地；休耕 vt. 使（土地）休闲；潜伏 同义词:inactive, sleepy, lie low, to conceal The market is also crimped by a rule that no more than 20% of farmland in any county may lie fallow .市场还受到一条规则的束缚：任何县中休耕农田不得超过农田总数的20%。
vi. 共谋；纵容；默许 同义词:conspire, collude Some government officials connive at graft.有些政府官员对贪污受贿视而不见。
n. [化学] 衍生物，派生物 adj. 派生的；引出的 同义词:ramification, offshoot, extracted, descendent Are there other hidden derivative deals out there?是否存在其他秘密的衍生品交易？
adj. 极权主义的 n. 极权主义者 In present or formerly totalitarian countries , this downward cycle is even more apparent .在当今以及过去的那些极权国家里，这种萧条周期更加明显。
n. 译文；演奏；提供；引渡逃奴 同义词:version, translation, playing, offering L. did an rendition of the Jackson 5 hit I 'll Be There .参加了杰克逊5组合的《我将在那里》的演唱。
n. 草地；牧场；牧草 vt. 放牧；吃草 同义词:grass, field, lawn, meadow, grass, feed, range The shepherd pastured his sheep on the village common.羊倌在村庄的公地上放羊。
n. 紧握；柄；支配；握拍方式；拍柄绷带 vt. 紧握；夹紧 vi. 抓住 同义词:governance, disposal, purchase, handle, ruling, squeeze, clamp, clutch at, take hold The frightened boy gripped his mother's hand.惊恐的男孩牢牢抓住妈妈的手。
n. [数] 约束；局促，态度不自然；强制 同义词:enforcement, restriction That suggests the need for an institutional constraint .这说明英国需要一个制度上的约束。
n. 条，棒；酒吧；障碍 vt. 禁止；阻拦 prep. 除……外 同义词:rod, staff, obstacle, dam, let, inhibit, forbid You should bar the door before retiring for the night.你晚上睡前应闩上门。
adj. 真正的，真实的；可信的 同义词:actual, sincere, genuine, true, real Last - and hardest of all - they need to convey empathy , " in a way that is authentic to them ".最后（也是最难的），他们必须“以一种对他们来说自然而又真诚的方式”，传递出同情心。
n. [农药] 赤霉素 同义词:activol A method of steady state optimization for Gibberellin Acid production is proposed.本文介绍了对赤霉素生产的发酵周期进行静态优化的一种方法。
vt. 隐藏；隐瞒 同义词:lock, pocket, to hide He concealed the key inside his tie.他把钥匙藏在领带里面。
n. 剥夺国籍；剥夺公民权利；非国有化 同义词:destatization The textile industry was denationalized.纺织业恢复为私营。
n. 移动性；机动性；[电子] 迁移率 同义词:maneuverability, manoeuvrability Traditionally , the middle class has supported meritocracy and upward mobility , more than the elite has done.传统上，中产阶级比精英分子更支持精英管理和个人向上流动。
adj. （论据等）站不住脚的；不能维持的；不能租赁的；难以防守的 同义词:indefensible If the Pru loses the vote , the management 's position would be untenable .如果保诚的计划被股东投票否决，这个管理层将站不住脚。

vt. 抵销；补偿；对抗 vi. 抵销；对抗 同义词:pay, make good, compete, war, balance Restrain growth when season network game and advertisement service battalion , partial countervail of gross profit embellish glide .当季网络游戏及广告服务营收增长，部分抵销了毛利润的下滑。
n. 小贩；传播者 同义词:pedlar, conveyor peddler bawled his wares .小贩叫卖他的商品。
n. 停止；中止；中断 同义词:stop, break, stay, hang, stand The crisis led to a cessation of the hallmarks of Indus elite culture .这项危机导致印度河菁英阶层文化特徵的中断。
adj. 陶瓷的；陶器的；制陶艺术的 n. 陶瓷；陶瓷制品 同义词:keramic, vitrified, cer, pottery and porcelain Why have I described somebody 's real ceramic elephant sitting on the mantel -piece ?为什么我要如实地描写某人安放在壁炉台上的那只陶瓷大象呢？
n. 减少，减小；减少量 vi. 减少，减小 vt. 减少，减小 同义词:reduction, loss, to cut down, fall off, shorten, weaken Water consumption decreased during the winter.冬季期间水消耗量减少。
n. 运动；移动；旅行 同义词:movement, removal, exercise, sport, campaign Proconsul gives us a good idea of the anatomy and locomotion of an early ape .祖猿让我们对早期猿类的解剖结构与移动模式，有比较完整的了解。
n. 冰河，冰川 同义词:ice floe These fish moved into glacier -carved lakes thirteen thousand years ago .这种鱼在一万三千年前就迁徙到冰川湖中。
n. 连合活字；标识；商标 同义词:brand, label, identifying The Suncor logotype must not be used without the Energy logotype and energy ring .该森科尔标识不得使用未经节能标识和能源环。
n. 分歧 同义词:variance, bifurcation, gulf The task of typography is to determine the degree of divergence .字体编排设计的任务同时也是决定分歧的程度。
n. 溢出；外流人口 同义词:superflux, extravasation First, we review the literatures of research on the technology spillover , and summarizes the estimation of spillover .本文对技术外溢的研究做了综述，并对技术外溢的测量进行了概述。
n. 征收；征兵，征税 vt. 征收（税等）；征集（兵等） vi. 征税；征兵 同义词:collection, taxation, expropriation, toll, tax collection, toll The government levies taxes on real estate and personal property.政府征收不动产和动产税。
vt. 在…上做拱 vi. 成拱形 同义词:cove A new stone bridge has overarched the river一座新石桥已在河上修建起来了。
vt. 废除；撤销；废止；放弃；否定 n. 废除；撤销 同义词:yield, desert, negative, abolish, abolition, destoolment He believes that death penalty will be repealed sooner or later.他相信死刑早晚会被废除。
adj. 双边的；有两边的 同义词:bipartite, two-sided Strengthened multilateral cooperation should and must respect and build on our already proven bilateral partnerships .加强多边合作应该也必须尊重和发展久经考验的双边合作关系。
n. （脑、肺等的）叶；裂片；耳垂；波瓣 同义词:lobus, frondage Senator Kennedy 's tumor is in the left parietal lobe of the brain .参议员肯尼迪的恶性肿瘤是在大脑做颅脑垂。
n. [胚] 胚胎；胚芽；初期 adj. 胚胎的；初期的 同义词:morning, prime, earlier, young These substances are slowly depleted as the embryo commences to grow .随着胚开始生长，这些物质也慢慢用尽了。
n. 电脑高速缓冲存储器；贮存物；隐藏处 vt. 隐藏；窖藏 vi. 躲藏 同义词:covert, lock, pocket, conceal, harbor, hide out They cached their sweets in their sleeves.他们把糖果藏在袖子里。
n. 腰带；围绕物；妇女紧身褡 vt. 围绕；绕…而行；用带子捆扎 同义词:waist belt, waistband, tape, enclose a village girdled with green fields绿色田野环绕的村庄
vi. 钓鱼；谋取 n. 角度，角 同义词:fish, figure for, hao, jiao Jack angled himself out of the car.杰克弓身下车。

n. 预防，警惕；预防措施 vt. 警惕；预先警告 同义词:prevention, prophylaxis, keep one's eye on the ball, keep one's eyes peeled It can be compared to a car seatbelt — a precaution , but no substitute for safe driving .这可以同轿车安全带相类比——是一项预防，但它并不能取代安全驾驶。
n. [胚] 神经发生；[胚] 神经形成 Intriguingly , regular physical activity such as running can also lift depression in humans , perhaps by activating neurogenesis .有趣的是，规律的体能活动（如跑步）也能纾解人类的抑郁症，这或许也是透过神经新生的活化吧。
adj. 完整的；纯粹的 n. 整体；全部 同义词:complete, pure, integrated, full, intact, full, integer Germany , however , is not whole zone .但是，德国并不是整个欧元区。
n. 人种音乐学 It is no doubt that the field works in 20 century have been set up a very stable foundation for the ethnomusicology in China.笔者毫不怀疑，20世纪的“实地考察”，已成为建立民族音乐学的一个牢固的基石。
n. 跑步者；走私者；推销员；送信人 同义词:salesman, smuggler Please prepare a stopwatch to record every runner 's time .请准备好跑表记录每个跑步者的时间。
n. 瓶颈；障碍物 同义词:barrier, block to bottleneck traffic on an approach to the airport使通往机场的交通受阻
vi. 分割 n. 段；部分 vt. 分割 同义词:to cut up, divide up, dan, proportion, part, portion, percent, to cut up, deleave to segment an iron bar把铁杆分割成段
vi. 进行；发动；从事 n. 工资；代价；报偿 vt. 进行；开展 同义词:progress, do, price, expense, pay, cost, do, carry with to wage a struggle进行一场斗争

adj. 邪恶的；不公正的 同义词:evil, ill, black, ugly, wicked We can use the word , " infamous " or iniquitous " to describe this kind of fame .我们可以用“声名狼藉”或“臭名昭著”去形容这类“名誉”。
